pr_title: Fixed #2233 [auth-server] few audit event fields are missing

timeline.message:

Fixed [auth-server] few audit event fields are missing #2233

Fixed test failure

Fixed test failure

timeline.bodyText: consider moving it to a cookie name helper, otherwise all AuditEventMappers in each component would need to be aware of this prefix.
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText:
AuditEventMapper is in common-service and all the services use this mapper. I've already added decode() in cookie helper, CookieHelper L69.
Please review and approve the PR.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

replies.bodyText:
can this function reuse the cookie prefix constant?
My problem is that if these prefix values are supposed to match one another, their value should not be scattered through the code, but should be set as a constant, or attached/removed in a global helper function and used by all other services.
This is not what we are doing here.
replies.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Cookies are set/get by auth-server only, other services don't use these cookies. I'll ask @harisboston to extract mystudies_ to constant and fix the review comment.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

replies.bodyText: the comment was about referring/using the same constant, rather than creating new constants everywhere. I'll approve for now, but please file a bug and fix it.
replies.author: zohrehj
